# loadPlaybackConfigurationOptions(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Loads playback configuration options for an asset.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadPlaybackConfigurationOptions(completionHandler: @escaping ([AVAssetPlaybackConfigurationOption]) -> Void)
```

```swift
var playbackConfigurationOptions: [AVAssetPlaybackConfigurationOption] { get async }
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A callback the system invokes with an array of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetPlaybackConfigurationOption] values that describe capabilities of the asset.
title: loadPlaybackConfigurationOptions(completionHandler:)
